name: colyseus-teams-project
description: component for a react lobby for colyseus multiplayer, client and server package

scripts.example:install: npm run example:client:install && npm run example:server:install
scripts.example:start:dev: concurrently "npm run --prefix example/server start:dev" "npm run --prefix example/client start:dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build:example: npm --prefix example/client run build && npm --prefix example/server run build
scripts.link:all: npm run link:client && npm run link:server
scripts.link:example: npm --prefix example/client link colyseus-teams-lobby-react.js && npm --prefix example/server link colyseus-teams-lobby
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:example: npm --prefix example/client run clean && npm --prefix example/server run clean
scripts.clean:hard: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf components/lobby/client/node_modules && rm -rf components/lobby/server/node_modules && rm -rf example/client/node_modules && rm -rf example/server/node_modules
